description: The seventh and final volume in the acclaimed "Foundation Series" follows such best-loved characters as Hari Seldon, Father of the Foundation, Cleon II, Emperor of the Galactic Empire, and Eto Demerzel, who wields the true power of the throne. 200,000 first printing. $200,000 ad/promo.
author: Isaac Asimov
